reviewText:
Playboy / Celebrity Centerfold: Shannon Tweed (Playboy Playmate of the Month for November 1981 & Playboy Playmate of the Year for 1982) is one hour and was released on DVD on August 5, 1998. Of the three Celebrity Centerfold videos that I own, this one is by far the best. Shannon Tweed is sexy, beautiful, and great looking in the nude. Every scene she is in, the clothes do not stay very long. Shannon got forty-three minutes of air time. I especially love her personality. Also in this video is Alicia Rickter, Playboy Playmate of the Month for October 1995. Alicia is also the 500th Playmate. Alicia twelve minute shoot was great also. She was nude in every scene except when she is talking about her life. There is basically no difference between the VHS & DVD. The main difference is that the VHS version comes with a sneak peek of 1997 Playboy Video Playmates Calendar. Playboy / Celebrity Centerfold: Shannon Tweed gets an AAAAA+++++.

Playboy / Celebrity Centerfold: Shannon Tweed is one hour and two minutes and was released on video on December 31, 1996. Of the three Celebrity Centerfold videos that I own, this one is by far the best. Shannon Tweed is sexy, beautiful, and great looking in the nude. Every scene she is in, the clothes do not stay very long. Shannon got forty-three minutes of air time. I especially love her personality. Also in this video is Alicia Rickter, Miss October 1995. Alicia is also the 500th Playmate. Alicia twelve minute shoot was great also. She was nude in every scene except when she is talking about her life. Playboy / Celebrity Centerfold: Shannon Tweed gets an AAAAA+++++.
